name: Zombie Cowboys
description:
In the overhead western of the United States at the end of the 19th century, an unknown virus turned everyone into zombies with wisdom. In addition to turn zombies, everything changed. This is an unknown and dangerous era that survival and development have become the main goals which means the more bullets and blades you have then the more louder you can speak.In this dangerous west land, as a zombie mayor, you need some zombie townspeople to survive and develop.

Features

-Unique western zombie theme stories, satisfying your fantasy of doomsday
-Hire unique zombie heroes and surpass your army to unify the west
-Real-time strategic game requires your wise decision. Alliance or war? Make your choice!
-Build alliances to conquer more territories,seize resources and defeat lawless elements. Rule the western world together.
-Build chat platform with alliance, group and voice. There are many options for communicating and discussing strategies with friends.
-Build and customize your own town.
-Become friends or enemies with players from all over the world with different cultures and languages.
-Participate in various activities every day to win priceless treasures.
